We offer a variety of dining experiences, including fine dining restaurants, casual eateries, and room service options. Explore our culinary offerings here. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy at The Sunset Hotel | Committed to Protecting Your Personal Information The Sunset Hotel Home About us Casino Contact Privacy Policy At The Sunset Hotel, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data. By using our services, you agree to the terms of this policy. We encourage you to read this policy thoroughly to understand our practices. If you have any questions, please contact our privacy team. We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services. This includes personal data such as your name, contact details, and payment information. We may also collect non-personal information like browser type, device information, and usage data. Additionally, we gather information from third-party sources such as booking partners and social media platforms. All information is collected in accordance with applicable laws. The information we collect is used to enhance your experience at The Sunset Hotel. This includes processing bookings, personalizing your stay, and providing customer support. We also use your data for marketing purposes, sending promotional materials and special offers. Furthermore, information is utilized to improve our services and develop new features. We ensure that all uses of your data are consistent with your preferences. We may share your information with third parties for specific purposes. This includes service providers who assist with payment processing, reservations, and marketing. We also share data with legal authorities when required by law. Additionally, we may disclose information to protect the rights and safety of The Sunset Hotel and its guests. Any sharing of data is conducted with strict confidentiality agreements in place. The security of your personal information is a top priority for us. We implement a variety of security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access and breaches. This includes encryption, firewalls, and secure server environments. We regularly review and update our security practices to stay ahead of potential threats. Despite these measures, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. You have the right to access, update, and delete your personal information. You can request a copy of the data we hold about you at any time. Additionally, you have the right to opt out of marketing communications and withdraw consent for data processing. To exercise these rights, please contact our privacy team. We will respond to your requests promptly and in accordance with applicable laws. Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies are small data files stored on your device that help us understand your preferences. We use cookies for various purposes, including site functionality, analytics, and advertising. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website. The Sunset Hotel does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18. Our services are intended for adults only. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected data from a minor, we will take steps to delete such information promptly. Parents and guardians are encouraged to monitor their children's online activities. If you believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately. TheSunsetHotel@gmail.com. We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy. This includes maintaining data for legal, accounting, and reporting obligations. Once your data is no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize it. Our retention periods are based on legal requirements and business needs. You can request deletion of your data at any time, subject to certain conditions. Our website may contain links to third-party websites and services. These links are provided for your convenience and do not imply endorsement. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any external sites you visit. Your interactions with these websites are governed by their respective privacy policies. Home About us Casino Contact Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Disclaimer 18+ © 2024 The Sunset Hotel. All rights reserved.

pages.about: About The Sunset Hotel | Discover Our Legacy of Luxury, Comfort, and Exceptional Service The Sunset Hotel Home About us Casino Contact About The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel Welcome to The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel, a premier destination renowned for its blend of luxury accommodation, thrilling entertainment, and impeccable service. Located in the heart of UK, our iconic establishment has been setting the standard for hospitality excellence since 1997. At The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel, we pride ourselves on creating a haven of sophistication and excitement for our guests. Our luxurious rooms and suites offer a sanctuary of comfort, featuring modern amenities and stunning views of the cityscape. Whether you're here for a weekend getaway or a corporate retreat, our accommodations cater to discerning travelers seeking both relaxation and indulgence. Indulge your senses with a variety of culinary experiences at our award-winning restaurants and bars, where our talented chefs craft delectable dishes inspired by local flavors and international cuisine. From casual dining to fine dining, each venue promises a culinary journey that delights the palate. The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel is not just a place to stay; it's an experience to savor. Our state-of-the-art casino floor offers an exhilarating array of gaming options, from classic table games to the latest slot machines, ensuring endless entertainment for our guests. Beyond gaming and dining, we offer exceptional event spaces and facilities for weddings, conferences, and special occasions. Our dedicated event planning team ensures every detail is meticulously executed, creating memorable moments that exceed expectations. As a cornerstone of hospitality in UK, The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel continues to uphold its legacy of excellence through unparalleled service, luxurious amenities, and a commitment to guest satisfaction. Whether you're visiting for leisure or business, we invite you to discover the essence of luxury and hospitality at The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel. Nestled amidst the vibrant energy of UK, The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel stands as a beacon of elegance and entertainment. With a rich history steeped in luxury and a commitment to innovation, our hotel continues to evolve, offering guests a seamless blend of timeless charm and modern convenience. Whether you're unwinding by the poolside, exploring nearby attractions, or enjoying our exclusive spa services, every moment at The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel is designed to elevate your experience and leave a lasting impression of unparalleled hospitality. Luxury Suite "Sunset Bliss" Indulge in opulence and sophistication with our Luxury Suite "Sunset Bliss" at The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel. This exclusive retreat offers panoramic views, complemented by spacious living areas and elegant décor. Featuring a king-size bed, a private balcony, and a luxurious bathroom with a deep soaking tub, "Sunset Bliss" is designed for those seeking ultimate comfort and relaxation in a lavish setting. Guests can also enjoy personalized concierge service and access to exclusive amenities, ensuring a memorable stay at our premier establishment. Executive Room "Skyline Serenity" Experience tranquility and contemporary elegance in our Executive Room "Skyline Serenity" at The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel. Ideal for business travelers and leisure guests alike, this room boasts modern furnishings, a plush queen-size bed, and a dedicated workspace with high-speed internet access. Guests can unwind in style with complimentary access to our fitness center and enjoy stunning views from the comfort of their room. "Skyline Serenity" offers a perfect blend of comfort and convenience for discerning travelers seeking a memorable stay. Deluxe Suite "Golden Horizon" Discover luxury redefined in our Deluxe Suite "Golden Horizon" at The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel. This spacious suite features separate living and sleeping areas, offering ample space for relaxation and entertainment. Adorned with modern décor and upscale amenities, including a plush seating area, a mini-bar, and a luxurious marble bathroom, "Golden Horizon" exudes sophistication and charm. Guests can enjoy complimentary access to our exclusive lounge, personalized concierge service, and breathtaking views, making it an ideal choice for those seeking an elevated experience during their stay. Our Advantage: Elevating Your Experience at The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel At The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel, we pride ourselves on offering a distinct advantage that sets us apart as a premier destination for luxury and entertainment. Our advantage lies in our unwavering commitment to providing exceptional service, luxurious accommodations, and a world-class gaming experience that surpasses expectations. 1000 Slot Machines 24/7 Gaming Action High-Stakes Poker Tournaments Innovative Approach: Redefining Excellence at The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel At The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel, we pride ourselves on our innovative approach to hospitality and entertainment, setting new standards in luxury and guest experience. Our commitment to innovation permeates every aspect of our establishment, ensuring that each guest enjoys a uniquely tailored and memorable stay. From the moment you step into our lobby, you'll experience our dedication to cutting-edge technology and modern conveniences. Our check-in process is streamlined for efficiency, allowing you to start your stay with ease. Throughout the hotel, smart technology enhances comfort and convenience, from automated room controls to personalized service through mobile apps. Exclusive Gaming Experience: The Sunset Casino Immerse yourself in the thrill of gaming excellence at The Sunset Casino, where sophistication meets excitement. As the premier gaming destination, our casino offers a diverse array of table games, slots, and exclusive VIP lounges. Whether you're a seasoned player or a novice, our professional staff is dedicated to ensuring an unparalleled gaming experience in a luxurious setting. Gourmet Delights: Dining at The Sunset Hotel Indulge your palate with culinary masterpieces at The Sunset Hotel's exquisite dining venues. From fine dining to casual fare, each restaurant offers a unique gastronomic journey. Enjoy authentic flavors, where our award-winning chefs craft dishes using locally sourced ingredients. Whether you're craving international cuisine or savoring a classic steakhouse experience, dining at The Sunset Hotel promises a memorable culinary adventure. Relaxation Redefined: Spa Serenity at The Sunset Hotel Escape to tranquility and rejuvenation at Spa Serenity, nestled within The Sunset Hotel. Our luxurious spa offers a sanctuary of relaxation with a range of pampering treatments and wellness services. From soothing massages to revitalizing facials, our experienced therapists ensure a personalized experience that restores balance and enhances well-being. Unwind in serene surroundings and indulge in a blissful escape at Spa Serenity, where every visit is designed to renew the mind, body, and spirit. Just Hear What They're Saying About Us Discover why guests and visitors alike are raving about The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel. From glowing testimonials to enthusiastic reviews, our guests' feedback speaks volumes about their experiences with us. Emily Johnson "Staying at The Sunset Hotel was a dream come true! The room was luxurious, the service impeccable, and the dining options exquisite. Can't wait to visit again!" David Smith "I had an amazing time at The Sunset Hotel Casino-Hotel. Sophia Brown "I hosted a business event at The Sunset Hotel and couldn't have been more impressed. The facilities were top-notch, the catering superb, and the staff incredibly accommodating." Daniel Thompson "The Sunset Casino-Hotel exceeded my expectations. The gaming options were fantastic, the restaurants were delicious, and the staff were always helpful and friendly." Isabella Garcia "My girlfriends and I had a fantastic girls' weekend at The Sunset Hotel. The spa treatments were heavenly, the cocktails were delicious, and the atmosphere was perfect for relaxation." Ryan Wilson "I've been to many hotels and casinos, but The Sunset Hotel stands out for its elegance and attention to detail. It's the perfect place to unwind and enjoy quality time." Emma Roberts "I've stayed at The Sunset Hotel multiple times for work and leisure, and it never disappoints. The rooms are luxurious, the location is convenient, and the service is exceptional." pages.casino: Experience Unmatched Thrills at The Sunset Hotel Casino | Your Premier Gaming Destination The Sunset Hotel Home About us Casino Contact Casino Casino Games at The Sunset Hotel & Casino Welcome to the thrilling world of casino games at The Sunset Hotel & Casino. Our establishment offers a diverse selection of exciting games designed to cater to every guest's preference and skill level. Whether you're a seasoned player or a novice looking to try your luck, our casino floor provides an electrifying atmosphere and endless entertainment. Most Popular Craps Roll the dice and bet on the outcome of the dice roll. Craps is a fast-paced game of chance with multiple betting options and a vibrant atmosphere. Rules: Players bet on the outcome of a roll or series of rolls of two dice. Most Popular Sic Bo Originating from China, Sic Bo is a dice game where players bet on the outcome of three dice being rolled. Rules: Players place bets on various combinations of the dice, including totals, specific numbers, and combinations. Most Popular Pai Gow Poker A variation of poker that combines elements of the Chinese game Pai Gow and traditional poker. Players aim to create two poker hands out of seven cards dealt. Rules: Players compete against the dealer, aiming to beat both of the dealer's hands to win. Most Popular Keno Keno is a lottery-style game where players select numbers on a card and hope their selections match numbers drawn randomly by a computer. Rules: Players can choose how many numbers to bet on and how much to wager per game. Most Popular Let It Ride Let It Ride is a poker-based game where players make three equal bets and receive three cards. They can then choose to withdraw bets or "let it ride" based on subsequent community cards. Rules: Players aim to create the best possible five-card hand using their own cards and the community cards. Most Popular Big Six Wheel Also known as the Wheel of Fortune or Money Wheel, Big Six Wheel is a game of chance where players bet on which segment of a large wheel the pointer will land on. Rules: Players place bets on various segments marked on the wheel, each with different odds and payouts. Plan Comparison at The Sunset Hotel & Casino Explore our comprehensive plan comparison to find the perfect package for your stay at The Sunset Hotel & Casino. Whether you're visiting for leisure, business, or a special occasion, we offer a range of plans tailored to suit your preferences and needs. Below, we outline the key features and benefits of each plan to help you make an informed decision Feature/plan Standard Plan Deluxe Plan Executive Plan Standard room with choice of bed type Complimentary breakfast Access to fitness center and pool Spacious room with luxury amenities Daily housekeeping and turndown service Enhanced in-room amenities (e.g., bathrobe, slippers) Connecting rooms or suites Kid-friendly activities and amenities Discounted dining options for children Workstation in room with high-speed internet Join Our Community: Where Every Voice Matters Step into our vibrant community where diversity of thought and unity of purpose drive our shared vision. We welcome individuals who are passionate about making a difference and contributing to something greater than themselves. Together, we cultivate an environment of respect, collaboration, and empowerment. Join us today and discover the power of community and collective achievement.
